mapper.update: UPDATE chart_element SET lyric = #{lyric}, sound = #{sound}, melody = #{melody}, storytelling = #{storytelling}, cohesiveness = #{cohesiveness}, creativity = #{creativity} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND album_id = #{albumId}
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(AVG(lyric)) AS lyric, ROUND(AVG(sound)) AS sound, ROUND(AVG(melody)) AS melody, ROUND(AVG(storytelling)) AS storytelling, ROUND(AVG(cohesiveness)) AS cohesiveness, ROUND(AVG(creativity)) AS creativity FROM chart_element WHERE album_id = #{albumId}
